meta.title: Motherhood changes everything. That's why we're making it easier to get your strength back.
meta.description: Safe, effective online workouts - Movement made for motherhood

hero.title: Motherhood changes everything. That's why we're making it easier to get your strength back.
hero.description: Get back to feeling strong, confident, and like yourself again with our safe, effective online workouts designed specifically for mums.
hero.imageAlt: Mother holding baby - SheMovesTheme fitness for mums

reasons.title: Real fitness for real motherhood. Not another cookie-cutter plan, we built the program we wish we had.
reasons.subtitle: Because we were tired of the polished, unachievable, and "quite fake" fitness industry that consistently fails mothers.

features.title: Your body changed. Your workouts should too.
features.description:
We're Ren & Jen mums to six kids and pre/postpartum trainers who've seen it all: the pelvic floor challenges, the prolapse scares, the 3am "is this normal?" messages.

We also saw a fitness industry pushing "bounce-back" plans that felt fake and ignored the incredible thing our bodies had just been through. We built She Moves to be different. A realistic, physio-approved path that honours your journey and helps you heal, strengthen, and feel powerful in your body again.
features.imageAlt: Ren and Jen, co-founders of She Moves

testimonials.quote: After being diagnosed with a prolapse, I felt lost and unsure how to exercise safely. She Moves gave me the plan and structure I had been missing for so long - I could just push play, follow along, and rebuild my confidence.
testimonials.author: Lezana

testimonials.quote: Today I ran my first ever 5.5km run, nearly 2 years postpartum after a harrowing pregnancy and very traumatic birth. I can honestly say its been the She Moves programme that has helped me achieve this and I'm so thankful.
testimonials.author: Sharon

testimonials.quote: She Moves has been a game changer for me. The workouts are safe, effective, and I can do them at home. I finally feel like myself again.
testimonials.author: Sarah

cta.title: Don't give up on your strength and confidence because now you will have the support to reach it

footer.tagline: Safe, effective online workouts - Movement made for motherhood
